##### Generic decisions/events
### ??
################################
# Grand Offensive - GER
################################
event = {
	id = 1300002
	random = no
	country = GER
	
	decision = { ai = yes atwar = yes }

	decision_trigger = { supplies = 10000 }

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			ai = yes
			supplies = 10000
		}
		OR = {
			war = { country = GER country = SOV }
			lost_national = { country = GER value = 5 }
		}
	}

	name = "GrandOffensiveName"
	desc = "GrandOffensiveDesc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Wehrmacht"
	decision_picture = "decision_grand_offensive"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "GrandOffensiveText"
		command = { type = max_organization which = land value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = land value = 10 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = morale which = land value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = naval value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = air value = 10 }
		command = { type = speed which = land value = 2 }
		command = { type = counterattack value = 2 }
		command = { type = assault value = 2 }
		command = { type = ambush value = 2 }
		command = { type = breakthrough value = 2 }
		command = { type = encirclement value = 2 }
		command = { type = hq_supply_eff value = 2 }
		command = { type = sce_frequency value = 0.3 }
		command = { type = attrition_mod value = 2 }
		command = { type = trickleback_mod value = 5 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -10000 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = event which = 1300003 where = -1 when = 30 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = event which = 1300003 where = -1 when = 120 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 1300003
	random = no
	country = GER

	name = "GrandOffensiveOverName"
	desc = "GrandOffensiveDesc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Wehrmacht"

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_OK
		command = { type = max_organization which = land value = -10 }
		command = { type = morale which = land value = -10 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = morale which = land value = -10 }
		command = { type = morale which = naval value = -10 }
		command = { type = morale which = air value = -10 }
		command = { type = speed which = land value = -2 }
		command = { type = counterattack value = -2 }
		command = { type = assault value = -2 }
		command = { type = ambush value = -2 }
		command = { type = breakthrough value = -2 }
		command = { type = encirclement value = -2 }
		command = { type = hq_supply_eff value = -2 }
		command = { type = sce_frequency value = -0.3 }
		command = { type = attrition_mod value = -2 }
		command = { type = trickleback_mod value = -5 }
	}
}

################################
# Grand Offensive - SOV
################################
event = {
	id = 1300004
	random = no
	country = SOV

	decision = { atwar = yes month = 11 }

	decision_trigger = { supplies = 10000 }

	trigger = {
		atwar = yes month = 11
		OR = { 
			ai = yes
			supplies = 10000
		}
		OR = {
			lost_national = { country = SOV value = 30 }
			AND = { 
				war = { country = GER country = SOV } 
				OR = { lost_national = { country = GER value = 10 } NOT = { ai = GER } }
			}
		}
	}
   
	name = "GrandWinterOffensiveName"
	desc = "GrandOffensiveDesc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Wehrmacht"
	decision_picture = "decision_grand_offensive3"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "GrandOffensiveText"
		command = { type = max_organization which = land value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = land value = 10 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = morale which = land value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = naval value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = air value = 10 }
		command = { type = speed which = land value = 2 }
		command = { type = counterattack value = 2 }
		command = { type = assault value = 2 }
		command = { type = ambush value = 2 }
		command = { type = breakthrough value = 2 }
		command = { type = encirclement value = 2 }
		command = { type = hq_supply_eff value = 2 }
		command = { type = sce_frequency value = 0.3 }
		command = { type = attrition_mod value = 2 }
		command = { type = trickleback_mod value = 5 }
	  	command = { type = frozen_move which = land value = 13 }
      		command = { type = frozen_attack which = land value = 13 }
	  	command = { type = snow_move which = land value = 13 }
      		command = { type = snow_attack which = land value = 13 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -10000 }
		command = { type = event which = 1300005 where = -1 when = 30 }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 1300006
	random = no
	country = ENG

	decision = { atwar = yes }

	decision_trigger = { supplies = 10000 }

	trigger = {
		lost_national = { country = ENG value = 10 }
		atwar = yes
		OR = {
			ai = yes
			supplies = 10000
		}
	}
   
	name = "GrandOffensiveName"
	desc = "GrandOffensiveDesc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Wehrmacht"
	decision_picture = "decision_grand_offensive5"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "GrandOffensiveText"
		command = { type = max_organization which = land value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = land value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = naval value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = air value = 10 }
		command = { type = speed which = land value = 2 }
		command = { type = counterattack value = 2 }
		command = { type = assault value = 2 }
		command = { type = ambush value = 2 }
		command = { type = breakthrough value = 2 }
		command = { type = encirclement value = 2 }
		command = { type = hq_supply_eff value = 2 }
		command = { type = sce_frequency value = 0.3 }
		command = { type = attrition_mod value = 2 }
		command = { type = trickleback_mod value = 5 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -10000 }
		command = { type = event which = 1300007 where = -1 when = 30 }
	}
}

# Grand Offensive - JAP

event = {
	id = 1300008
	random = no
	country = JAP

	decision = { atwar = yes }

	decision_trigger = { supplies = 10000 }

	trigger = {
		atwar = yes
		OR = {
			ai = yes
			supplies = 10000
		}
		OR = {
			war = { country = JAP country = CHI } 
			war = { country = JAP country = USA } 
			lost_national = { country = JAP value = 10 } 
		}
	}
   
	name = "GrandOffensiveName"
	desc = "GrandOffensiveDesc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "Wehrmacht"
	decision_picture = "decision_grand_offensive5"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 10
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "GrandOffensiveText"
		command = { type = max_organization which = land value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = land value = 10 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = morale which = land value = 30 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = max_organization which = land value = 30 }
		command = { type = morale which = naval value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = air value = 10 }
		command = { type = speed which = land value = 2 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = speed which = land value = 8 }
		command = { type = counterattack value = 2 }
		command = { type = assault value = 2 }
		command = { type = ambush value = 2 }
		command = { type = breakthrough value = 2 }
		command = { type = encirclement value = 2 }
		command = { type = hq_supply_eff value = 2 }
		command = { type = sce_frequency value = 0.3 }
		command = { type = attrition_mod value = 2 }
		command = { type = trickleback_mod value = 5 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -10000 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = event which = 1300009 where = -1 when = 30 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = event which = 1300009 where = -1 when = 120 }
	}
}

		command = { type = speed which = land value = 2 }
		command = { type = morale which = naval value = 10 }
		command = { type = morale which = air value = 10 }

		command = { type = counterattack value = 2 }
		command = { type = assault value = 2 }
		command = { type = ambush value = 2 }
		command = { type = breakthrough value = 2 }
		command = { type = encirclement value = 2 }
		command = { type = hq_supply_eff value = 2 }
		command = { type = sce_frequency value = 0.3 }
		command = { type = attrition_mod value = 2 }
		command = { type = trickleback_mod value = 5 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = supplies value = -2000 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = event which = 1300019 where = -1 when = 30 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = yes } type = event which = 1300019 where = -1 when = 120 }
	}
}

		technology = 5920

	}

	}

			ai = no

			country = NOR
			country = SWE
			country = FIN
		}
		NOT = {	
			OR = {
				resource_shortage = supplies
				resource_shortage = oil
			}	
		}	
	}

################################
# Generic set of decisions
################################
#### Create Public Works
event = {
	id = 9000021
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	decision = { 
		atwar = no
		OR = {
			money = 3000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 2000
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 1500
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 500
				}	
			}
		OR = { 
			NOT = { policy = { type = free_market value = 8 } }
			headofstate = 240001 # FDR
		}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		OR = {
			money = 6000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 4000
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 3000
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 1000
				}	
			}
		atwar = no
	}

	trigger = {
		atwar = no
		money = 6000
		OR = { 
			NOT = { policy = { type = free_market value = 8 } }
			headofstate = 240001 # FDR
		}
	}
   
	name = "9000021name"
	desc = "9000021desc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "public_jobs"
	decision_picture = "decision_public_jobs"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 120
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "9000021text"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = money value = -6000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = money value = -4000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = money value = -3000 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = money value = -1000 }
		command = { trigger = { domestic = { type = free_market value = 5 } } type = domestic which = free_market value = -1 }
		command = { type = event which = 9000040 where = -1 when = 60 }
	}
}

#### Money Devaluation
event = {
	id = 9000023
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	decision = { 
		OR = {
			money = 1000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 700
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 500
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 150
				}	
			}
		atwar = no
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		OR = {
			money = 3000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 2000
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 1500
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 500
				}	
			}
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = no
		money = 3000
		NOT = { dissent = 5 }
	}
   
	name = "9000023name"
	desc = "9000023desc"
	style = 2
	picture = "money_devaluation"
	decision_picture = "decision_money_devaluation"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 180
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

		name = "9000023text"
		command = { type = dissent value = 3 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = money value = -3000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = money value = -2000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = money value = -1500 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = money value = -500 }
		command = { type = industrial_modifier which = total value = 0.5 }

#### Allow Foreign Volunteers
event = {
	id = 9000025
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }

	random = no
	persistent = yes

	decision = { 
		NOT = { local_flag = foreign_volunteers }
		government = democratic
		OR = { NOT = { manpower = 200 } country = FRA }
		atwar = yes
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		government = democratic
		OR = { NOT = { manpower = 100 } country = FRA } # Isn't this so harsh that it makes the decision impossible to take?
		atwar = yes
	}

	trigger = {
		NOT = { local_flag = foreign_volunteers }
		random = 20
		government = democratic
		OR = { NOT = { manpower = 100 } country = FRA }
		atwar = yes
	}
   
	name = "9000025name"
	desc = "9000025desc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "foreign_volunteers"
	decision_picture = "decision_foreign_volunteers"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 180
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "9000025text"
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 1 when = 1 }
		command = { type = relative_manpower value = 0.01 }
		command = { type = morale which = land value = -2 }
		#command = { type = unit when = morale value = -0.500 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = foreign_volunteers }
	}
}

	}

		command = { trigger = { technology = { country = USA value = 1460 } } type = add_division value = motorized when = 7 }

#### Press Censorship
event = {
	id = 9000027
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	decision = { 
		NOT = { local_flag = press_censorship }
		government = democratic
		atwar = yes
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		government = democratic
		atwar = yes
		OR = {
			money = 500
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 400
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 250
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 100
				}	
			}
	}

	trigger = {
		NOT = { local_flag = press_censorship }
		OR = {
			random = 80
			dissent = 3
		}
		government = democratic
		atwar = yes
		money = 500
	}
   
	name = "9000027name"
	desc = "9000027desc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "censorship"
	decision_picture = "decision_censorship"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 120
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "9000027text"
		command = { trigger = { domestic = { type = democratic value = 3 } } type = domestic which = democratic value = -1 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		#command = { type = dissent value = -0.1000 } # Should be 10%
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = money value = -500 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = money value = -400 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = money value = -250 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = money value = -100 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = press_censorship }
	}
}
#### War Propaganda
event = {
	id = 9000028
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	decision = { 
		NOT = { local_flag = war_propaganda }
		atwar = yes
		NOT = { local_flag = MOB9 }
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		atwar = yes
		OR = {
			money = 500
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 400
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 250
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 100
				}	
			}
	}

	trigger = {
		NOT = { local_flag = war_propaganda }
		OR = {
			random = 80
			dissent = 3
		}
		atwar = yes
		money = 500
		NOT = { local_flag = MOB9 }
	}
   
	name = "9000028name"
	desc = "9000028desc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "war_propaganda"
	decision_picture = "decision_war_propaganda"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 60
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "9000028text"
		command = { trigger = { domestic = { type = freedom value = 3 } } type = domestic which = freedom value = -1 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -3 }
		command = { type = manpowerpool value = 0.1 when = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = money value = -500 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = money value = -400 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = money value = -250 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = money value = -100 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = war_propaganda }
	}

#### Ersatz Conversion
event = {
	id = 9000029
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { GER ITA JAP U08 U09 }

	decision = { 
		energy = 5000
		NOT = { rare_materials = 10000 }
		NOT = { local_flag = ersatz_conversion }
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		#money = 500
		energy = 20000
		NOT = { rare_materials = 10000 }
	}

	trigger = {
		#NOT = { dissent = 5 }
		NOT = { rare_materials = 200 }
		NOT = { local_flag = ersatz_conversion }
		energy = 20000
	}
   
	name = "9000029name"
	desc = "9000029desc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "ersatz_conversion"
	decision_picture = "decision_ersatz_conversion"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 120
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "9000029text"
		#command = { type = dissent value = 2 }
		#command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = money value = -500 }
		command = { type = event which = 9000052 where = -1 when = 15 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ersatz_conversion }
	}
}

	}

#### Invest in National Infrastructures
event = {
	id = 9000030
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	decision = { 
		OR = {
			money = 800
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 650
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 400
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 200
				}	
			}
		NOT = { policy = { type = free_market value = 8 } }
		NOT = { local_flag = infra_investment_1 }
		NOT = { local_flag = infra_investment_2 }
		NOT = { local_flag = infra_investment_3 }
	}

	decision_trigger = { 
		OR = {
			money = 1000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 800
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 600
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 300
				}	
			}
	}

	trigger = {
		random = 20
		money = 1000
		#NOT = { policy = { type = free_market value = 8 } }
		NOT = { local_flag = infra_investment_1 }
		NOT = { local_flag = infra_investment_2 }
		NOT = { local_flag = infra_investment_3 }		
	}
   
	name = "9000030name"
	desc = "9000030desc" 
	style = 2
	picture = "invest_infrastructures"
	decision_picture = "decision_invest_infrastructures"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 120
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		trigger = { OR = { AND = { IC = 80 money = 1000 } AND = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 800 } AND = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 600 } AND = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 300 } } }
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "9000030a"
		command = { type = dissent value = -0.5 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 money = 1000 } type = money value = -1000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 800 } type = money value = -800 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 600 } type = money value = -600 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 300 } type = money value = -300 }
		command = { type = event which = 9000053 where = -1 when = 30 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = infra_investment_1 }
	}
	action = {
		trigger = { OR = { AND = { IC = 80 money = 2000 } AND = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 1600 } AND = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 1200 } AND = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 600 } } }
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "9000030b"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 money = 2000 } type = money value = -2000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 1600 } type = money value = -1600 }

	id = 9000031
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }

		OR = {
			money = 800
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 650
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 400
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 200
				}	
			}
		NOT = { policy = { type = free_market value = 8 } }
		NOT = { local_flag = research_investment_1 }
		NOT = { local_flag = research_investment_2 }
		NOT = { local_flag = research_investment_3 }		
	}

		OR = {
			money = 1000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 800
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 600
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 300
				}	
			}
	}

		random = 60
		money = 1000
		#NOT = { policy = { type = free_market value = 8 } }
		NOT = { local_flag = research_investment_1 }
		NOT = { local_flag = research_investment_2 }
		NOT = { local_flag = research_investment_3 }		
	}

#### Diplomatic Campaign
event = {
	id = 9000034
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG = { GER U08 }

	decision = { 
		money = 300
		atwar = no
	}

	decision_trigger = { 
		money = 500
		atwar = no
	}

	trigger = {
		random = 5
		money = 500
		atwar = no
		ai = no
	}

	id = 9000037

	persistent = yes
	tag = { U08 FRA U09 ENG RUS ITA USA OTT CAN }

		NOT = { local_flag = war_bonds }
		atwar = yes
	}

		NOT = { local_flag = war_bonds }
		OR = {
			random = 80
			NOT = { supplies = 1000 }
		}
		atwar = yes
		NOT = { dissent = 5 }
	}

				}

event = {
	id = 9000048
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }   
	persistent = yes
	random = no

	decision = { 
		NOT = { local_flag = recruitment_campaign }
		NOT = { manpower = 15 }
		policy = { type = professional_army value = 2 } #at least Full Professional Army (no demilitarized countries)
		NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 7 } } #Not partial Mob or higher
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 20 }
				money = 250
			}
			AND = {
				IC = 20
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 500
			}
			AND = {
				IC = 50
				money = 750
			}
		}
	}
	
	decision_trigger = { 
		NOT = { manpower = 15 }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 20 }
				money = 500
			}
			AND = {
				IC = 20
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 1000
			}
			AND = {
				IC = 50
				money = 1500
			}
		}
	}
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { local_flag = recruitment_campaign }
		NOT = { manpower = 15 }
		policy = { type = professional_army value = 2 } #at least Full Professional Army (no demilitarized countries)
		NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 7 } } #Not partial Mob or higher
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 20 }
				money = 500
			}
			AND = {
				IC = 20
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 1000
			}
			AND = {
				IC = 50
				money = 1500
			}
		}	
	}

   date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
   offset = 210
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }
   
   name = "9000048name"
   desc = "9000048desc" 
   style = 2
   picture = "foreign_volunteers"
   decision_picture = "decision_foreign_volunteers"

	action = {
		name = "9000048actionA"
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 } type = money value = -1500 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 20 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = money value = -1000 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 20 } } type = money value = -500 }
		command = { trigger = { ai = no NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 5 } } } type = dissent value = 2 } #higher dissent for dove lobby
		command = { trigger = { ai = no policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 5 }  NOT = { policy = { type = defense_lobby value = 9 } } } type = dissent value = 1 } #lower dissent for higher defense lobby (no dissent at all for almost full or full hawk lobby
		command = { type = event which = 9000049 where = -1 when = 180 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = recruitment_campaign }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 9000049
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AZB BEL BEN BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIE WLL YEM YUG U01 U02 U03 U04 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U67 UTC UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }

	name = "9000049name"
	desc = "9000049desc"
	style = 2
	picture = "foreign_volunteers"
	
	action = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_GREAT"
		#country demilitarized in the meantime, you still get something
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 2 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 1 } 
		#full professional army
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 20 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 2 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 3 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 12 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 20 NOT = { IC = 50 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 2 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 3 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 25 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 policy = { type = professional_army value = 2 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 3 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 40 }
		#selective conscription
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 20 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 3 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 4 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 8 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 20 NOT = { IC = 50 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 3 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 4 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 20 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 policy = { type = professional_army value = 3 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 4 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 32 }
		#1 year conscription
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 20 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 4 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 5 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 6 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 20 NOT = { IC = 50 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 4 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 5 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 15 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 policy = { type = professional_army value = 4 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 5 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 24 }
		#2 years conscription
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 20 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 5 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 6 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 4 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 20 NOT = { IC = 50 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 5 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 6 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 10 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 policy = { type = professional_army value = 5 }  NOT = { policy = { type = professional_army value = 6 } } } type = manpowerpool value = 16 }
		#3 years conscription (if a country mobilizes, it still gets this)
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 20 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 6 } } type = manpowerpool value = 2 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 20 NOT = { IC = 50 } policy = { type = professional_army value = 6 } } type = manpowerpool value = 5 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 policy = { type = professional_army value = 6 } } type = manpowerpool value = 8 }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = recruitment_campaign }
	}
}

############### National Development Plan

event = {
	id = 999051
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	save_date = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ALI ALS ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AXI AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MIN MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIC VIE WLL YEM YUG U00 U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U66 U67 UCH UTC UGS UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	decision = { 
		OR = {
			money = 3200
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 2600
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 1600
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 800
				}	
			}
		NOT = { IC = 150 }
		# NOT = { policy = { type = free_market value = 9 } }
		NOT = { local_flag = industry_investment_1 }
		NOT = { local_flag = industry_investment_2 }
		NOT = { local_flag = industry_investment_3 }
		NOT = { ai = yes }		
	}

	decision_trigger = { 
		OR = {
			money = 4000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 3200
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 2400
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 1200
				}	
			}
	}

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			money = 4000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 3200
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 2400
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 1200
				}	
			}
		NOT = { IC = 150 }
		NOT = { local_flag = industry_investment_1 }
		NOT = { local_flag = industry_investment_2 }
		NOT = { local_flag = industry_investment_3 }
		NOT = { ai = yes }		
	}
   
	name = "National Development Plan"
	desc = "By investing in our infrastructure and industries we might reduce the number of unemployed and create a good scenario to atract new investments to the area. This will not only help and please the population, but it will also increase the industrial capacity of our country." 
	style = 2
	picture = "ndp"
	decision_picture = "decision_ndp"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 120
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		trigger = { OR = { AND = { IC = 80 money = 4000 } AND = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 3200 } AND = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 2400 } AND = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 1200 } } }
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "9000031a"
		command = { type = dissent value = -0.5 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 money = 4000 } type = money value = -4000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 3200 } type = money value = -3200 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 2400 } type = money value = -2400 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 1200 } type = money value = -1200 }
		command = { type = event which = 999052 where = -1 when = 90 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = industry_investment_1 }	
	}
	action = {
		trigger = { OR = { AND = { IC = 80 money = 8000 } AND = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 6400 } AND = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 4800 } AND = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 2400 } } }
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "9000031b"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 money = 8000 } type = money value = -8000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 6400 } type = money value = -6400 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 4800 } type = money value = -4800 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 2400 } type = money value = -2400 }
		command = { type = event which = 999052 where = -1 when = 90 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = industry_investment_2 }		
	}
	action = { 
		trigger = { OR = { AND = { IC = 80 money = 12000 } AND = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 9600 } AND = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 7200 } AND = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 3600 } } }
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "9000031c"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }

		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 3600 } type = money value = -3600 }

	id = 999052
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ALI ALS ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AXI AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MIN MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIC VIE WLL YEM YUG U00 U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U66 U67 UCH UTC UGS UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }

#########################################################################
########### Western Wall
#########################################################################

event = {
	id = 999133
	random = no
	persistent = no
	country = GER
	
	decision = { 
		war = { country = GER  country = SOV }
		control = { province = 163 } # Berlin
		control = { province = 55 data = -2 } # Paris in enemy hands
		     }

	decision_trigger = { 
		war = { country = GER  country = SOV }
		control = { province = 163 } # Berlin
		control = { province = 55 data = -2 } # Paris in enemy hands
		money = 1000
				}
	trigger = { 
		war = { country = GER  country = SOV }
		control = { province = 163 } # Berlin
		control = { province = 55 data = -2 } # Paris in enemy hands
		money = 1000
				}

	name = "The Western Wall"
	desc = "The Western Wall ('Siegfried Line' to the Allies) was a defence system stretching more than 630 km with more than 18,000 bunkers, tunnels and tank traps. It went from Kleve on the border with the Netherlands, along the western border of the old German Empire as far as the town of Weil am Rhein on the border to Switzerland. More with Nazi propaganda in mind than for any strategic reason, Adolf Hitler planned the line from 1936 and had it built between 1938 and 1940 to delay the advance of the Allies."
	style = 2
	picture = "westwall"
	decision_picture = "decision_westwall"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1939 }
	offset = 30
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "Schnell!"
		command = { trigger = { ai = no } type = money value = -1000 }
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
	      command = { trigger = { control = { province = 119 } } type = construct which = land_fort where = 119 value = 2 }
	      command = { trigger = { control = { province = 126 } } type = construct which = land_fort where = 126 value = 2 }
	      command = { trigger = { control = { province = 127 } } type = construct which = land_fort where = 127 value = 2 }
	      command = { trigger = { control = { province = 128 } } type = construct which = land_fort where = 128 value = 2 }
	      command = { trigger = { control = { province = 129 } } type = construct which = land_fort where = 129 value = 2 }
	      command = { trigger = { control = { province = 130 } } type = construct which = land_fort where = 130 value = 2 }
	      command = { trigger = { control = { province = 131 } } type = construct which = land_fort where = 131 value = 2 }
	      command = { trigger = { control = { province = 132 } } type = construct which = land_fort where = 132 value = 2 }
	}
}

#########################################################################
########### Indoctrination
#########################################################################

event = {
	id = 999068
	random = no
	all = yes
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ALI ALS ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AXI AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MIN MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIC VIE WLL YEM YUG U00 U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U66 U67 UCH UTC UGS UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	
	decision = { 
		NOT = { local_flag = indoctrination }
		NOT = { ai = yes }	
		OR = {
		NOT = { domestic = { type = democratic value = 4 } }	
		NOT = { domestic = { type = freedom value = 4 } }	
		     }
		     }

	decision_trigger = { 
		NOT = { local_flag = indoctrination }
		NOT = { ai = yes }	
		OR = {
		NOT = { domestic = { type = democratic value = 4 } }	
		NOT = { domestic = { type = freedom value = 4 } }	
		     }
		     }

	trigger = { 
		NOT = { local_flag = indoctrination }
		NOT = { ai = yes }	
		OR = {
		NOT = { domestic = { type = democratic value = 4 } }	
		NOT = { domestic = { type = freedom value = 4 } }	
		     }
		     }

	name = "Indoctrination"
	desc = "Indoctrination is the process of inculcating ideas, attitudes, cognitive strategies or a professional methodology. The indoctrinated person is expected not to question or critically examine the doctrine they have learned. Implement it in our country may cause some protests, but will bring profits in the long term." 
	style = 2
	picture = "indoctrination"
	decision_picture = "decision_indoctrination"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 90
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "FW_EVT_900008_ACTIONB"
		command = { type = dissent value = 4 }
		command = { type = relative_manpower value = 0.0500 }
		command = { type = domestic which = defense_lobby value = 1 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = indoctrination }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 999139
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	save_date = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ALI ALS ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AXI AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MIN MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIC VIE WLL YEM YUG U00 U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U66 U67 UCH UTC UGS UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	decision = { 
		atwar = no
		NOT = { local_flag = education }
		NOT = { local_flag = noeducation }
		NOT = { ai = yes }
	}

	decision_trigger = { 
		atwar = no
		NOT = { local_flag = education }
		NOT = { local_flag = noeducation }
		NOT = { ai = yes }
	}

	trigger = {
		atwar = no
		NOT = { local_flag = education }
		NOT = { local_flag = noeducation }
		NOT = { ai = yes }
	}
   
	name = "Invest in Education"
	desc = "Investing in Education is crucial to any country that wants to develop itself. By increasing the government investment in our schools and universities we will spend more money in the present, but in the future this will prove to be worthwile." 
	style = 2
	picture = "education"
	decision_picture = "decision_education"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 40
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		name = "9000031b"
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = free_money value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = free_money value = -0.8 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = free_money value = -0.6 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = free_money value = -0.3 }
		command = { type = event which = 999140 where = -1 when = 1000 } #1000 days, same as Invest in Research
		command = { type = local_setflag which = education }	
	}
	action = {
		name = "ACTION_NAME_NO_NEED"
		command = { type = event which = 999140 where = -1 when = 1000 } #1000 days, same as Invest in Research
		command = { type = local_setflag which = noeducation }	
	}
}

event = {
	id = 999140
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	save_date = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ALI ALS ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AXI AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MIN MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIC VIE WLL YEM YUG U00 U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U66 U67 UCH UTC UGS UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }

	name = "Invest in Education"
	desc = "The results of our investments in the educational area start to appear. Shall we continue to invest or elect other priorities?" 
	style = 2
	picture = "education"

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = education atwar = no }
		name = "Great! Keep investing!"
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { research_mod = 100 } } type = research_mod value = 0.5 }
		command = { trigger = { research_mod = 100 NOT = { research_mod = 120 } } type = research_mod value = 0.3 }
		command = { trigger = { research_mod = 120 } type = research_mod value = 0.1 }
		command = { type = event which = 999140 where = -1 when = 1000 } #1000 days, same as Invest in Research
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = education }
		name = "Great! But we've another priorities now."
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { research_mod = 100 } } type = research_mod value = 0.5 }
		command = { trigger = { research_mod = 100 NOT = { research_mod = 120 } } type = research_mod value = 0.3 }
		command = { trigger = { research_mod = 120 } type = research_mod value = 0.1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = free_money value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = free_money value = 0.8 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = free_money value = 0.6 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = free_money value = 0.3 }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = education }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = noeducation }
		name = "We haven't invested enough..."
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = noeducation }
	}

}

event = {
	id = 999144
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	save_date = yes

	name = "Invest in Public Security"
	desc = "Our investments in the public security area seems to appear. A big scheme of corruption and traffic was dismantled and we recovered a good amount of the value. Now, shall we continue to invest or elect other priorities?" 
	style = 2
	picture = "police"

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = police atwar = no NOT = { local_flag = police2} }
		name = "Great! Keep investing!"
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = money value = 1000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = money value = 800 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = money value = 600 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = money value = 300 }
		command = { type = event which = 999144 where = -1 when = 1000 } #1000 days, same as Invest in Research
	}

		trigger = { local_flag = police NOT = { local_flag = police2} }
		name = "Great! But we've another priorities now."

		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = free_money value = 0.8 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = free_money value = 0.6 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = free_money value = 0.3 }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = police }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = nopolice }
		name = "We haven't invested enough..."
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = nopolice }
	}

		trigger = { local_flag = police atwar = no local_flag = police2 }
		name = "Great! Keep investing!"
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = money value = 500 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = money value = 400 }

	}

		trigger = { local_flag = police local_flag = police2 }
		name = "Great! But we've another priorities now."
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = money value = 500 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = money value = 400 }

	persistent = yes
	save_date = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ALI ALS ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AXI AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MIN MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIC VIE WLL YEM YUG U00 U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U66 U67 UCH UTC UGS UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }

	name = "Taxes"
	desc = "Once again this year we have to decide the annual budget. We may collect more money by overtaxing the nation, but it can be very harsh for our industries." 
	style = 2
	picture = "wage"

	action = {
		trigger = { 
		OR = {
			local_flag = taxmin 
			local_flag = taxlow 
			local_flag = taxacc 
			local_flag = taxhigh 
			}
				}
		name = "Keep current standings."
		command = { type = event which = 999149 where = -1 when = 360 } #360 days, each year
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = taxmin }
		name = "Review the index."
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = taxmin }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = free_money value = 2 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = free_money value = 1.6 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = free_money value = 1.2 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = free_money value = 0.6 }
		command = { type = free_ic value = -2 }

	}

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = taxlow }
		name = "Review the index."
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = taxlow }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = free_money value = 1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = free_money value = 0.8 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = free_money value = 0.6 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = free_money value = 0.3 }
		command = { type = free_ic value = -1 }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = taxacc }
		name = "Review the index."
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = taxacc }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = free_money value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = free_money value = -0.8 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = free_money value = -0.6 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = free_money value = -0.3 }
		command = { type = free_ic value = 1 }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = taxhigh }
		name = "Review the index."
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = taxhigh }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 } type = free_money value = -2 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } } type = free_money value = -1.6 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } } type = free_money value = -1.2 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } } type = free_money value = -0.6 }
		command = { type = free_ic value = 2 }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { local_flag = notax }
		name = "Review the index."
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = notax }
	}

}

#########################################################################
############### Search for Oil, Metal and Rare Materials
#########################################################################

event = {
	id = 9991500
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	save_date = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ALI ALS ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AXI AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MIN MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIC VIE WLL YEM YUG U00 U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U66 U67 UCH UTC UGS UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }
	decision = { 
		OR = {
			money = 100
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 100
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 100
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 100
				}	
			}
		NOT = { local_flag = oil_investment_1 }
		NOT = { local_flag = oil_investment_2 }
		NOT = { local_flag = oil_investment_3 }
		NOT = { ai = yes }		
	}

	decision_trigger = { 
		OR = {
			money = 7000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 6000
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 4000
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 2000
				}	
			}
	}

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			money = 7000
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 80 }
				money = 6000
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 50 }
				money = 4000
				}
			AND = {
				NOT = { IC = 15 }
				money = 2000
				}	
			}
		NOT = { local_flag = oil_investment_1 }
		NOT = { local_flag = oil_investment_2 }
		NOT = { local_flag = oil_investment_3 }
		NOT = { ai = yes }		
	}
   
	name = "Search for Oil, Metal and Rare Materials."
	desc = "By investing in the search for oil, metal and rare materials we might reduce the number of unemployed and create a good scenario to attractive new investments to the area. This will not only help and pleased the population, but it will also increase the economic capacity of our country." 
	style = 2
	picture = "abadan_oil"
	decision_picture = "decision_abadan_oil"

	date = { day = 1 month = january year = 1914 }
	offset = 180
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1999 }

	action = {
		trigger = { OR = { AND = { IC = 80 money = 7000 } AND = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 6000 } AND = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 4000 } AND = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 2000 } } }
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "9000031a"
		command = { type = dissent value = -0.5 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 money = 3500 } type = money value = -7000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 6000 } type = money value = -6000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 4000 } type = money value = -4000 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 2000 } type = money value = -2000 }
		command = { type = event which = 9991510 where = -1 when = 360 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = oil_investment_1 }	
	}
	action = {
		trigger = { OR = { AND = { IC = 80 money = 9000 } AND = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 8000 } AND = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 6000 } AND = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 4000 } } }
		ai_chance = 30
		name = "9000031b"
		command = { type = dissent value = -1 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 money = 9000 } type = money value = -9000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 8000 } type = money value = -8000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 6000 } type = money value = -6000 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 4000 } type = money value = -4000 }
		command = { type = event which = 9991510 where = -1 when = 360 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = oil_investment_2 }		
	}
	action = { 
		trigger = { OR = { AND = { IC = 80 money = 11000 } AND = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 10000 } AND = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 8000 } AND = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 6000 } } }
		ai_chance = 40
		name = "9000031c"
		command = { type = dissent value = -2 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 80 money = 11000 } type = money value = -11000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 50 NOT = { IC = 80 } money = 10000 } type = money value = -10000 }
		command = { trigger = { IC = 15 NOT = { IC = 50 } money = 8000 } type = money value = -8000 }
		command = { trigger = { NOT = { IC = 15 } money = 6000 } type = money value = -6000 }
		command = { type = event which = 9991510 where = -1 when = 360 }
		command = { type = local_setflag which = oil_investment_3 }				
	}
}
event = {
	id = 9991510
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	TAG =  { AFG ALB ALG ALI ALS ANG ARA ARG ARM AST AUS AXI AZB BEL BEN BHU BLR BOL BOS BRA BRU BUL BUR CAL CAM CAN CGX CHC CHI CHL CMB COL CON COS CRO CSA CSX CUB CXB CYN CYP CZE DDR DEN DFR DOM EAF ECU EGY ENG EQA EST ETH EUS FIN FLA FRA GAB GEO GER GLD GRE GUA GUI GUY HAI HOL HON HUN ICL IDC IND INO IRE IRQ ISR ITA JAP JOR KAZ KOR KUR KYG LAO LAT LBY LEB LIB LIT LUX MAD MAL MAN MEN MEX MIN MLY MON MOR MOZ MTN NAM NEP NIC NIG NOR NZL OMN OTT PAK PAL PAN PAR PER PHI POL POR PRI PRK PRU QUE RHO ROM RSI RUS SAF SAL SAR SAU SCA SCH SCO SER SIA SIB SIE SIK SLO SLV SOM SOV SPA SPR SUD SWE SYR TAJ TAN TEX TIB TRA TRK TUN TUR UKR URU USA UZB VEN VIC VIE WLL YEM YUG U00 U01 U02 U03 U04 U05 U06 U08 U09 U10 U11 U12 U13 U14 U15 U16 U17 U18 U19 U20 U21 U22 U23 U24 U25 U26 U27 U28 U29 U30 U31 U32 U33 U34 U35 U39 U40 U41 U42 U43 U44 U45 U46 U47 U48 U49 U50 U51 U52 U53 U54 U55 U56 U57 U58 U59 U60 U66 U67 UCH UTC UGS UER UPE U70 U71 U72 U73 U75 U76 U77 U78 U79 U80 U81 U82 U83 U84 U85 U86 U87 U88 U89 U90 U91 U92 U93 U94 U95 U96 U97 U98 U99 }

	name = "Search for Oil, Metal and Rare Materials."
	desc = "Here are the results of our investments in the search for oil, metal and rare materials." 
	style = 2
	picture = "abadan_oil"

	action = {
		name = ACTION_NAME_EXCELLENT
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_1 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 1.2 where = metal }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_1 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 0.8 where = rare_materials }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_1 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 0.4 where = oil }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_1 } type = local_clrflag which = oil_investment_1 }	
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_2 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 1.8 where = metal }	
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_2 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 1.4 where = rare_materials }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_2 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 0.8 where = oil }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_2 } type = local_clrflag which = oil_investment_2 }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_3 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 2.4 where = metal }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_3 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 1.8 where = rare_materials }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_3 } type = add_prov_resource which = -1 value = 1.1 where = oil }
		command = { trigger = { local_flag = oil_investment_3 } type = local_clrflag which = oil_investment_3 }
	}
}
