# Austalia

event = {
	id = 888220
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { PER }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Mesopotamia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Mesopotamia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Persia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_conservative }

		name = "Adopt a Conservative Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Persia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = market_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Market Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_mli" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Iran"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Social Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_sli" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Iran"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Iran"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

		name = "Adopt a Left-Wing Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_lwr" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Rep. Persia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_LWR }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Rep. Persia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Rep. Persia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_LEN }
	}
}


#America - North

event = {
	id = 888001
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { USA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = USA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "Federated America"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "USA"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "Imperial America"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_conservative }

		name = "Adopt a Conservative Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "USA"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = market_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Market Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_mli" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "USA"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Social Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_sli" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "USA"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "USA"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

		name = "Adopt a Left-Wing Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_lwr" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "People's America"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_LWR }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "Socialist America"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = USA which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = USA which = "Soviet America"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = USA_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = USA_LEN }

event = {
	id = 888002
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CAN }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAN_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CAN which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = CAN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CAN_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CAN which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CAN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CAN_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_LEN }

	action = {

		command = { type = name where = CAN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CAN_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CAN which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = CAN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CAN_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAN_LEN }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 888004
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CAL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CAL which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CAL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CAL_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CAL which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CAL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CAL_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAL_STA }
	}

	action = {

event = {
	id = 888005
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { BRA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = BRA_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRA_LEN }
	}
}

event = {
	id = 888006
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { COL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = COL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = COL which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = COL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = COL_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = COL which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = COL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = COL_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COL_SCO }

event = {
	id = 888008
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { BOL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BOL which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = BOL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BOL_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BOL which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = BOL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BOL_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BOL which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = BOL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BOL_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_conservative }

		name = "Adopt a Conservative Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BOL which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = BOL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BOL_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOL_MLI }

# Europe



event = {
	id = 888009
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { RUS }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = RUS_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russian Empire"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russian Empire"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_conservative }

		name = "Adopt a Conservative Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russian Federation"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = market_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Market Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_mli" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russian Federation"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Social Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_sli" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

		name = "Adopt a Left-Wing Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_lwr" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russian SSR."}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_LWR }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russian SSR."}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = RUS which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = RUS which = "Russian SSR."}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = RUS_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = RUS_LEN }

#europe - change tag to soviet countries


event = {
	id = 888010
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { DFR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DFR_NAZ }

	id = 888011
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { HOL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HOL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HOL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = HOL which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = HOL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = HOL_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HOL_LEN }

event = {
	id = 888012
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { FRA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FRA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = FRA which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = FRA which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = FRA_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = FRA which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = FRA which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = FRA_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FRA_STA }
	}

	action = {

# Middle-Eas

event = {
	id = 888013
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SYR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SYR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SYR which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SYR which = "Sarazinia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SYR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SYR which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = SYR which = "Sarazania"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SYR_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SYR which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = SYR which = "Kalifat of Syria"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SYR_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_FAS }

	action = {

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_STA }
	}

	action = {

		name = "Adopt a Market Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = name where = SYR which = "Syria"}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Social Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SYR which = "_sli" }
		command = { type = name where = SYR which = "Syria"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SYR_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SYR which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = SYR which = "Arab Rep. of Syria"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SYR_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

		name = "Adopt a Left-Wing Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SYR which = "_lwr" }
		command = { type = name where = SYR which = "IR. Syria"}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_NAZ }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SYR which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = SYR which = "Syria"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SYR_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SYR_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888014
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { IRQ }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRQ_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = IRQ which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = IRQ which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = IRQ_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = IRQ which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = IRQ which = "Assyria"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = IRQ_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IRQ_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LEB_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LEB_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LEB_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LEB_STA }
	}

	action = {

event = {
	id = 888016
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { AFG }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AFG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = AFG which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = AFG which = "Great Afghan"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = AFG_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = AFG which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = AFG which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = AFG_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AFG_SLI }

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ALG which = "_lwr" }
		command = { type = name where = ALG which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ALG_LWR }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALG_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALG_FAS }

	}

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = ALG which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALG_NAZ }

event = {
	id = 888019
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { ARA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ARA which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = ARA which = "Gearter Arabia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ARA_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ARA which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = ARA which = "Arab Empire"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ARA_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARA_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ARG which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = ARG which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ARG_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARG_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ARG which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = ARG which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888021
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { ARM }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ARM_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ARM which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = ARM which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ARM_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ARM_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ARM which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = ARM which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AZB_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AZB_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AZB_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AZB_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = AZB which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = AZB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = AZB_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AZB_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AZB_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888023
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { ANG }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_SCO }

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }

				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }

				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }

				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_LWR }

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ANG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ANG which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = ANG which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ANG_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ANG_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ANG_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ANG_SCO }
