	id = 888024
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { ARA }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = ARACOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = ARADEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = ARAFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

event = {
	id = 888029
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { BHU }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = BHUCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = BHUDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = BHUFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = BHUCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = BHUDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = BHUFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = BHU which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = BHU which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = BHUCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHUFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHUDEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = BHU which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = BHU which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = BHUFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHUCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHUDEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = BHU which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = BHU which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = BHUDEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHUCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHUFAS }
	}		
}


event = {
	id = 888030
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { BLR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BLR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BLR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BLR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BLR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BLR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BLR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BLR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BLR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }

	offset = 1

event = {
	id = 888031
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { BOS }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {

				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}

				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BOS_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BOS which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = BOS which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BOS_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BOS which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = BOS which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BOS_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BOS_STA }

	action = {

			}

event = {
	id = 888032
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { BRU }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BRU_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BRU which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = BRU which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BRU_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BRU which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = BRU which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BRU_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BRU_SCO }

	id = 888033
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { BUR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUR_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUR_STA }
	}

event = {
	id = 888262
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CAM }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CAM_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CAM which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CAM which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CAM_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CAM which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CAM which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CAM_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CAM_LWR }

	id = 888035
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CMB }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CMB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {

			}

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}

	style = 2

	offset = 1

	action = {

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CMB which = "_naz" }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_AUT }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CMB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CMB which = "Cmbodia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CMB_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CMB which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = CMB which = "Kampuchea"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CMB_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CMB_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888036
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CON }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CON_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CON which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = CON which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CON_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_STA }
	}

	action = {

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CON which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CON which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CON_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CON_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = COS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = market_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Market Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = COS which = "_mli" }
		command = { type = name where = COS which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888038
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CRO }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CRO_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CRO which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = CRO which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CRO_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CRO which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CRO which = "Great Hrvat"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CRO_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CRO_STA }
	}

	action = {

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = CRO which = "Kingdom of Croatia"}

event = {
	id = 888040
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CUB }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CUB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CUB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CUB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CUB_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CUB_STA }
	}

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CYP which = "_sli" }
		command = { type = name where = CYP which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CYP_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYP_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CYP which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = CYP which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888042
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { DOM }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DOM_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = DOM which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = DOM which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = DOM_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DOM_STA }
	}

		command = { type = flag_ext where = DOM which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = DOM which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888043
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { EAF }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = EAFCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EAFDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EAFFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EAFCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EAFDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EAFFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = EAF which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = EAF which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = EAFCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EAFFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EAFDEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = EAF which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = EAF which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = EAFFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EAFCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EAFDEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = EAF which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = EAF which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = EAFDEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EAFCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EAFFAS }
	}		
}

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ECU which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = ECU which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ECU_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ECU_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = market_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Market Liberal Flag"

event = {
	id = 888045
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { EGY }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = EGY_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = EGY which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = EGY which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = EGY_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = EGY which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = EGY which = "Empire of Misr"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = EGY_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = EGY which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = EGY which = "Kalifat of Egypt"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = EGY_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_conservative }

		name = "Adopt a Conservative Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = EGY which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = EGY which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EGY_SLI }

event = {
	id = 888048
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { POR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = POR which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = POR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = POR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = POR which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = POR which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_AUT }

event = {
	id = 888049
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { EUS }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = EUSCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EUSDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EUSFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EUSCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EUSDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = EUSFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = EUS which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = EUS which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = EUSCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EUSFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EUSDEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = EUS which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = EUS which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = EUSFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EUSCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EUSDEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = EUS which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = EUS which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = EUSDEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EUSCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = EUSFAS }
	}		
}

	id = 888050
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { FLA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = FLA_NAZ }

			}

event = {
	id = 888051
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { GAB }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GAB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = GAB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = GAB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = GAB_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GAB_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GAB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GAB_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GAB_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GAB_SLI }

event = {
	id = 888053
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { GLD }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GLD_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = GLD which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = GLD which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = GLD_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GLD_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = GLD which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = GLD_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888055
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { GUI }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GUI_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = GUI which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = GUI which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = GUI_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = GUI which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = GUI which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = GUI_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GUI_LEN }

event = {
	id = 888057
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { HAI }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HAI_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HAI_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HAI_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HAI_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HAI_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = HAI_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = HAI_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HAI_STA }

			}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HAI_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HAI_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HAI_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HAI_STA }
	}

event = {
	id = 888061
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { ISR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ISR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ISR which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = ISR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ISR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ISR which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = ISR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ISR_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ISR_SCO }

	id = 888063
	random = no
	persistent = yes

	decision = {

				NOT = { local_flag = KAZ_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

		trigger = { ideology = market_liberal }

event = {
	id = 888064
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { KUR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KUR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = KUR which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = KUR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = KUR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = KUR which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = KUR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = KUR_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KUR_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KYG_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KYG_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KYG_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Social Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = name where = KYG which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888067
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { LAT }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAT_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = LAT which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = LAT which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = LAT_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = LAT which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = LAT which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = LAT_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAT_SDM }

	action = {

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = POR which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = POR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = POR_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_AUT }

event = {
	id = 888069
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { LIB }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LIB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = LIB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = LIB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = LIB_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = LIB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = LIB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = LIB_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIB_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LIT_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

		name = "Adopt a Left-Wing Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = LIT which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = LIT which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888071
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { MAD }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAD_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = MAD which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = MAD which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MAD_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = MAD which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = MAD which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MAD_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAD_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = MAL which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = MAL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MAL_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAL_STA }
	}

	action = {

		command = { type = name where = MAL which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888073
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { MAN }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MAN_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = MAN which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = MAN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MAN_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = MAN which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = MAN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MAN_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MAN_NAZ }
