		command = { type = flag_ext where = MEN which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = MEN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MEN_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEN_LEN }
			}
}

event = {
	id = 888075
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { MLY }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = MLYCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = MLYDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = MLYFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = MLYCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = MLYDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = MLYFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = MLY which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = MLY which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = MLYCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLYFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLYDEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = MLY which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = MLY which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = MLYFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLYCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLYDEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = MLY which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = MLY which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = MLYDEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLYCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLYFAS }
	}		
}

	id = 888076

event = {
	id = 888078
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { MOZ }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MOZ_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = MOZ which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = MOZ which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MOZ_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MOZ_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MOZ_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = MTN which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = MTN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MTN_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MTN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = MTN which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888080
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { NAM }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NAM_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = NAM which = "_aut_b" }
		command = { type = name where = NAM which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = NAM_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NAM_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = NAM which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = NAM which = ""}

		command = { type = flag_ext where = NEP which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = NEP which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = NEP_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = NEP which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = NEP which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = NEP_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NEP_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888082
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { NIG }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

			}

				NOT = { local_flag = NIG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		command = { type = name where = NIG which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NIC_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NIC_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NIC_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = NIC which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = NIC which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = NIC_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NIC_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NIC_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = OMN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = OMN_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = OMN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = OMN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = OMN_SDM }

event = {
	id = 888086
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { OTT }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = OTT_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = OTT_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = OTT_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

				NOT = { local_flag = OTT_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = OTT_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = OTT_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = OTT_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = OTT which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = OTT which = "Ottomans"}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = OTT_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAK_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAK_LEN }
			}
}

event = {
	id = 888088
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { PAL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_SCO }

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PAL which = "" }
		command = { type = name where = PAL which = "Juda"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PAL_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = PAL which = "AL Quds Republic"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PAL_FAS }

	id = 888090
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { PAR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}

			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PAR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PAR which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = PAR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PAR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PAR_STA }
	}

event = {
	id = 888091
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { PER }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PER_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Iran"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }

	action = {

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PER which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = PER which = "Persian Empire"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PER_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PER_MLI }

	id = 888094
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { PRU }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_SCO }

			}

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRU_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PRU which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = PRU which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PRU_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRU_STA }
	}

event = {
	id = 888095
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { QUE }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = QUECOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = QUEDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = QUEFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = QUECOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = QUEDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = QUEFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = QUE which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = QUE which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = QUECOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = QUEFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = QUEDEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = QUE which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = QUE which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = QUEFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = QUECOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = QUEDEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = QUE which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = QUE which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = QUEDEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = QUECOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = QUEFAS }
	}		
}

	id = 888096
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { rho }

	decision = {
		OR = {

event = {
	id = 888097
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SAF }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAF_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SAF which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SAF which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SAF_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SAF which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = SAF which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SAF_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAF_SCO }

event = {
	id = 888098
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SAL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_AUT }

			}
			AND = {

				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = SAL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}

	offset = 1

event = {
	id = 888099
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SAR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SAR which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = SAR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SAR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

event = {
	id = 888100
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SAU }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SAU_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SAU which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SAU which = "MOEP"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SAU_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAU_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAU_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAU_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SAU which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = SAU which = "Great Arabia"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SAU_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAU_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SAU_AUT }

	id = 888101
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SCA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SCA which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SCA which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SCA_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCA_STA }
	}

	action = {

event = {
	id = 888102
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SCO }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = SCOCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SCODEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SCOFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SCOCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SCODEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SCOFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = SCO which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = SCO which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = SCOCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCOFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCODEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = SCO which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = SCO which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = SCOFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCOCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCODEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = SCO which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = SCO which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = SCODEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCOCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCOFAS}
	}		
}


event = {
	id = 888103
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SER }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SER_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SER_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SER_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SER_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

			}

			}

			}

			}

				NOT = { local_flag = SER_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = SER_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

event = {
	id = 888104
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SIA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SIA which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SIA which = "Thailand"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SIA_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SIA which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = SIA which = "Thailand"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SIA_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIA_AUT }

event = {
	id = 888105
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SIB }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

			}

				NOT = { local_flag = SIB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	style = 2

	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = name where = SIB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SIB_NAZ }

event = {
	id = 888106
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SIE }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = SIECOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SIEDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SIEFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SIECOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SIEDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = SIEFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = SIE which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = SIE which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = SIECOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIEFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIEDEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = SIE which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = SIE which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = SIEFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIECOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIEDEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = SIE which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = SIE which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = SIEDEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIECOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIEFAS }
	}		
}

event = {
	id = 888107
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SIK }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

			}

			}

				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SIK_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SLO which = "_sli" }
		command = { type = name where = SLO which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SLO_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLO_MLI }

event = {
	id = 888109
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SLV }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_SCO }

				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SLV_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SLV which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SLV which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SLV_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SLV_STA }
	}

		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = local_setflag which = SOM_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SOM_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SOM_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SOM_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SOM_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SOM_MLI }

event = {
	id = 888112
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { TAJ }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

			}

				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }

				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

			}

				NOT = { local_flag = TAJ_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TAN_LEN }
			}
}

event = {
	id = 888114
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { TEX }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = TEXCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = TEXDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = TEXFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = TEXCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = TEXDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = TEXFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = TEX which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = TEX which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = TEXCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEXFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEXDEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = TEX which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = TEX which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = TEXFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEXCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEXDEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = TEX which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = TEX which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = TEXDEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEXCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEXFAS }
	}		
}

event = {
	id = 888115
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { TIB }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TIB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = TIB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = TIB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = TIB_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TIB_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TIB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TIB_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TIB_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TIB_SLI }

	id = 888116
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { TRA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = TRA_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = TRA which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = TRA which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = TRA_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = TRA which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = TRA which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = TRA_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRA_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888117
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { TRK }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_SCO }

				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TRK_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = TRK which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = TRK which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = TRK_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRK_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRK_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TRK_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = TUN which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = TUN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = TUN_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUN_LEN }

event = {
	id = 888119
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { UKR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UKR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = UKR which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = UKR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = UKR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UKR_STA }
	}

		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = URU which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = URU which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = URU_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = URU_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = URU_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888121
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { UZB }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UZB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UZB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

				OR = { ideology = nazi }

	offset = 1

		command = { type = flag_ext where = VEN which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = VEN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = VEN_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = VEN_LEN }
			}

event = {
	id = 888123
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { WLL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = WLL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = WLL which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = WLL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = WLL_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WLL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WLL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WLL_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = WLL_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = YEM_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = YEM_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = YEM_LEN }
			}
}

event = {
	id = 888137
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { MLY }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = MLY_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = MLY which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = MLY which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = MLY_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MLY_STA }
	}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U77_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U77_LEN }

	}

event = {
	id = 888140
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U78 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U78_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U78 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = U78 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U78_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U78_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = U78 which = ""}

			}

			}

				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }

	}

		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U79 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = U79 which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U79_NAZ }
