event = {
	id = 888142
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { u80 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = u80_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u80_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		command = { type = name where = u80 which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U81_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U81_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U81_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U81_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U81_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U81 which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = U81 which = "Upper Volta"}

event = {
	id = 888144
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U82 }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = U82COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U82DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U82FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U82COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U82DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U82FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U82 which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = U82 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U82COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82DEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U82 which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = U82 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U82FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82DEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U82 which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = U82 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U82DEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82FAS }
	}		
}


event = {
	id = 888145
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U83 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U83_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U83_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U83_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U83_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

			}

			}

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U83_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U83_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U83_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U83_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}

event = {
	id = 888146
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U84 }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = U84COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U84DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U84FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U84COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U84DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U84FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	offset = 1

	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U84 which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = U84 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U84FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U84COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U84DEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U84 which = "_mli"}
	#command = { type = name where = U84 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U84DEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U84COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U84FAS }
	}		
}



event = {
	id = 888147
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U85 }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = U85COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U85DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U85FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U85COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U85DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U85FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."

event = {
	id = 888150
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U88 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U88_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U88 which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = U88 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U88_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U88_STA }
	}

		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U88 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = U88 which = ""}

	id = 888151
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U89 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U89_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U89_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U89_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U89_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}

				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				OR = { ideology = leninist }

event = {
	id = 888152
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U90 }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = U90COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U90DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U90FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U90COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U90DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U90FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U90 which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = U90 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U90COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U90FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U90DEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U90 which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = U90 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U90FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U90COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U90DEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U90 which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = U90 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U90DEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U90COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U90FAS }
	}		
}

event = {
	id = 888153
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U91 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U91_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U91_FAS }

	id = 888154
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U92 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U92_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U92_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U92_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U92_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U92_SCO }

event = {
	id = 888155
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U93 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U93_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U93_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}

	offset = 1

		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

event = {
	id = 888157
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U95 }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = U95COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U95DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U95FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U95COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U95DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U95FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U95 which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = U95 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U95COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U95FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U95DEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U95 which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = U95 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U95FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U95COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U95DEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U95 which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = U95 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U95DEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U95COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U95FAS }
	}		
}

event = {
	id = 888158
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { u96 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u96_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = u96 which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = u96 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = u96_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u96_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u96_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u96_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u96_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u96_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u96_SDM }

	id = 888159
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U97 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U97_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U97_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U97_AUT }

event = {
	id = 888160
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U98 }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = U98COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U98DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U98FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U98COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U98DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U98FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U98 which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = U98 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U98COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U98FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U98DEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U98 which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = U98 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U98FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U98COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U98DEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U98 which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = U98 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U98DEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U98COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U98FAS }
	}		
}

event = {
	id = 888161
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { u99 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u99_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = u99 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = u99 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = u99_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = u99 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = u99 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = u99_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u99_NAZ }

event = {
	id = 888162
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { KOR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_SCO }

			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = KOR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = KOR_LEN }
			}
}

event = {
	id = 888163
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SPR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SPR which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SPR which = "Falangist Spain"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SPR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SPR which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = SPR which = "Nationalist Spain"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SPR_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPR_STA }

	action = {

event = {
	id = 888164
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { IDC }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = IDCCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = IDCDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = IDCFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = IDCCOM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = IDCDEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = IDCFAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = IDC which = "_com" }
	#command = { type = name where = IDC which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = IDCCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = IDCFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = IDCDEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = IDC which = "_fas" }
	#command = { type = name where = IDC which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = IDCFAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = IDCCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = IDCDEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = IDC which = ""}
	#command = { type = name where = IDC which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = IDCDEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = IDCCOM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = IDCFAS }
	}		
}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = IND which = "_lwr" }
		command = { type = name where = IND which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = IND_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = IND which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = IND which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = IND_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = IND_NAZ }

event = {
	id = 888166
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { JAP }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = JAP_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = JAP which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = JAP which = "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = JAP_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = JAP which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = JAP which = "Japanese Empire"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = JAP_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = JAP_STA }
	}

	action = {

	id = 888168
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { NOR }

	decision = {

				NOT = { local_flag = NOR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = NOR which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = NOR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = NOR_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = NOR_LEN }
			}
}



event = {
	id = 888169
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { DEN }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = DEN_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = DEN which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = DEN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = DEN_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = DEN which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = DEN which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = DEN_SCO }

event = {
	id = 888170
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U73 U12 }

	decision = {
	OR = {
		AND = {
			NOT = { local_flag = U73COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U73DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U73FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U73COM }
		OR = {
			ideology = leninist
			ideology = stalinist
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U73DEM }
		OR = {
			ideology = social_democrat
			ideology = social_liberal
			ideology = market_liberal
			ideology = social_conservative
			}
		}
	AND = {
		NOT = { local_flag = U73FAS }
		OR = {
			ideology = nazi
			ideology = fascist
			}
		}
	}
}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 2 month = july year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
	trigger = { government = communist }

	name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	command = { type = country which = U12 }
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U73COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U73FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U73DEM }
	}
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Fascist }

	name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

	command = { type = flag_ext where = U73 which = "_fas" }
	command = { type = name where = U73 which = ""}
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U73FAS }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U73COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U73DEM }
	}		
		
	action = {
	trigger = { government = Democratic }

	name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

	command = { type = country which = U73 }
	command = { type = local_setflag which = U73DEM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U73COM }
	command = { type = local_clrflag which = U73FAS }
	}		
}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

		name = "Adopt a Left-Wing Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = FIN which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = FIN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = FIN_LWR }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = FIN which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = FIN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = FIN_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_SOC }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = FIN which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = FIN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = FIN_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = FIN_SOC }

event = {
	id = 888172
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { HUN }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HUN_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = HUN which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = HUN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = HUN_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = HUN which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = HUN which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = HUN_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HUN_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = leninist }

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = POR which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = POR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = POR_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = POR which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = POR which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POR_NAZ }

event = {
	id = 888174
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { AUS }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AUS_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = AUS which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = AUS which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = AUS_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = AUS which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = AUS_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AUS_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BEL which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = BEL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BEL_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BEL_LEN }
			}

event = {
	id = 888176
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { LUX }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

			}

				NOT = { local_flag = LUX_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCH_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCH_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCH_LEN }
			}
}

event = {
	id = 888179
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { BUL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_SCO }

			}

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = BUL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BUL which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = BUL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BUL_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BUL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = BUL which = ""}

	id = 888180
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { ROM }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ROM_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ROM_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

				OR = { ideology = leninist }

event = {
	id = 888181
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { TUR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TUR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = TUR which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = TUR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = TUR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TUR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

event = {
	id = 888182
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CZE }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CZE_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

		ai = yes
		OR = {

event = {
	id = 888183
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { POL }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = POL_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = POL which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = POL which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = POL_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = POL_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

event = {
	id = 888184
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { YUG }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = YUG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = YUG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = YUG_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = YUG_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

			}

				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = YUG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

			}

			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ALB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ALB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ALB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ALB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ALB which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = ALB which = "Albania"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ALB_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ALB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = ALB which = "Empire of Sqip"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ALB_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ALB_STA }

event = {
	id = 888186
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { GRE }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = GRE_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = GRE which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = GRE which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = GRE_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GRE_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GRE_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GRE_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GRE_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GRE_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GRE_STA }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = GRE which = ""}

	id = 888187
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { ITA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ITA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = ITA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

		command = { type = name where = ITA which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ITA_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ITA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ITA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ITA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ITA_MLI }

event = {
	id = 888188
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CHI }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHI_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CHI which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = CHI which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CHI_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CHI which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CHI which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CHI_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CHI which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = CHI which = "Empire of China"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CHI_AUT }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_conservative }

		name = "Adopt a Conservative Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CHI which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = CHI which = "KMT China"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CHI_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHI_STA }

	action = {
