	id = 888189
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { VIE }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}

			}
			}
			}

		ai = no

				NOT = { local_flag = VIE_NAZ }

event = {
	id = 888191
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CHC }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CHC_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CHC which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CHC which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CHC_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CHC which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CHC which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CHC_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CHC_SCO }

event = {
	id = 888192
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SPA }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SPA_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SPA which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SPA which = "Flagelage Movement"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SPA_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SPA_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SPA which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = SPA which = "Nat. Spain"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SPA_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888193
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SWE }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SWE_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SWE which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SWE which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SWE_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SWE_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SWE_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SWE_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SWE_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SWE_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SWE_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SWE_LWR }

	}

	random = no
	persistent = yes

	decision = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SOV_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SOV which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = SOV which = "National Union"}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SOV_LEN }

event = {
	id = 888194
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { LBY }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_SCO }

			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LBY_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

	offset = 1

		command = { type = name where = ETH which = "Abessinia"}

event = {
	id = 888196
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	save_date = yes
	tag = { U08 }

	decision = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U08_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt Third Reich Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U08 which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = U08 which = "Third Reich"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U08_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U08_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U08_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U08_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U08_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U08_LWR }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U08_STA }
	}

		command = { type = name where = U08 which = "German State"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U08_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U08_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U08_AUT }

	persistent = yes

			}

		command = { type = flag_ext where = GER which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = GER which = "Germany"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = GER_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_STA }
	}
	
	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = market_liberal }

		name = "Adopt German Republic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = GER which = "_mli" }
		command = { type = name where = GER which = "German Republic"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = GER_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = GER_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888200
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { UPR }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPR_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = UPR which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = UPR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = UPR_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = UPR which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = UPR which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = UPR_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UPR_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UCH_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UCH_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UCH_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UCH_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UCH_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UCH_STA }
	}

event = {
	id = 888203
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { ENG }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = ENG_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ENG which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = ENG which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ENG_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ENG which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = ENG which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = ENG_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

		name = "Adopt a Monarchist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ENG which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = ENG which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = ENG_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_conservative }

		name = "Adopt a Conservative Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = ENG which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = ENG which = ""}

	id = 888202
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U09 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U09_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U09_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U09_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U09_SCO }

			}

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {

				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }

			}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_liberal }

		name = "Adopt a Social Liberal Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U09 which = "_mli" }
		command = { type = name where = U09 which = "Kuk-Federation"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U09_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_MLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U09_STA }
	}

	action = {

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = name where = U09 which = "Central Europe Republic"}

event = {
	id = 888204
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { AST }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = AST_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = AST which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = AST which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = AST_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = AST which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = AST which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = AST_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = AST_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEX_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEX_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEX_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = MEX_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = name where = MEX which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888206
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U02 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U02_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U02 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = U02 which = "Raj"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U02_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U02 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = U02 which = "Empire of Raj"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U02_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U02_SCO }

event = {
	id = 888208
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U32 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U32_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U32_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U32_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U32_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U32_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U32_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }

	offset = 1

event = {
	id = 888210
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U16 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U16_SCO }

				NOT = { local_flag = U16_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U16_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U16 which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = U16 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U16_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U16_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U16_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U16_SCO }

	id = 888212
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U74 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U74_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U74_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U74_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

		ai = yes

				NOT = { local_flag = U74_NAZ }

	offset = 1

		name = "Adopt a Leninist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U03 which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = U03 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U03_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U03_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U03 which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = U03 which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888214
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U51 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U51_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U51_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U51 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = U51 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U51_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U51_STA }
	}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHU_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHU_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHU_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = BHU which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = BHU which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = BHU_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHU_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = BHU_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888216
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { IRE }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }

			}

				NOT = { local_flag = IRE_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EST_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = EST_LEN }
			}
}

event = {
	id = 888218
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { INO }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = INO_SCO }

				NOT = { local_flag = INO_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = INO_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = INO which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = INO which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = INO_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = INO_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = name where = INO which = ""}

	id = 888219
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { UPE }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPE_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UPE_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

event = {
	id = 888221
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { UTC }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UTC_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = UTC which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = UTC which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = UTC_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = UTC which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = UTC which = "Russian Empire"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = UTC_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = UTC_LEN }

event = {
	id = 888222
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { UER }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = UER_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

	offset = 1

event = {
	id = 888223
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { PRI }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PRI_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = PRI which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = PRI which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = PRI_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRI_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRI_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRI_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRI_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRI_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRI_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRI_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PRI_STA }

			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U72_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U72_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U72_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U72_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U72_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U72_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U72 which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = U72 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U72_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U72_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U72_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U72_SCO }

event = {
	id = 888227
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U43 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U43_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U43_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U43_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				OR = { ideology = leninist }

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no

				NOT = { local_flag = U42_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	style = 2

	offset = 1

	id = 888229
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U48 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U48_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U48_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U48_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				OR = { ideology = leninist }

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no

event = {
	id = 888232
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U41 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U41_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U41 which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = U41 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U41_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U41_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U41_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U41_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U41_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U41_SLI }

	persistent = yes

event = {
	id = 888234
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U28 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U28_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U28 which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = U28 which = "Albania"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U28_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U28 which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = U28 which = "Empire of Sqip"}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U28_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U28_MLI }

	random = no
	persistent = yes

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = HON_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = HON_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HON_SCO }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HON_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = HON_STA }
	}

event = {
	id = 888237
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CXB }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CXB_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CXB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CXB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CXB_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CXB which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CXB which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CXB_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CXB_SCO }

				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U06_AUT }

event = {
	id = 888238
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CGX }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CGX_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CGX which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CGX which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CGX_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CGX_STA }
	}

		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYN_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYN_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CYN_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_conservative }

		name = "Adopt a Conservative Flag"

		command = { type = name where = CYN which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888240
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { CSX }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = CSX_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CSX which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CSX which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CSX_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = CSX which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = CSX which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = CSX_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = CSX_LWR }

	id = 888241
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { PHI }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = PHI_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = PHI_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PHI_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PHI_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PHI_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PHI_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PHI_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PHI_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PHI_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = PHI_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = market_liberal }

event = {
	id = 888245
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { LAO }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = LAO_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = LAO which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = LAO which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = LAO_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = LAO which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = LAO which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = LAO_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = LAO_SDM }

event = {
	id = 888243
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U87 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U87_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }

				NOT = { local_flag = U87_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U87_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U87_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U87 which = "_mli" }
		command = { type = name where = U87 which = ""}

event = {
	id = 888247
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U82 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }

				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
