				NOT = { local_flag = U82_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U82_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U82 which = "_aut" }
		command = { type = name where = U82 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U82_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U82_SCO }

		command = { type = local_setflag which = SIE_SLI }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = social_democrat }

		name = "Adopt a Social Democratic Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SIE which = "" }
		command = { type = name where = SIE which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SIE_SDM }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = left_wing_radical }

		name = "Adopt a Left-Wing Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SIE which = "_len" }
		command = { type = name where = SIE which = ""}

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SIE_NAZ }

event = {
	id = 888248
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { TEX }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = TEX_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = TEX which = "_sco" }
		command = { type = name where = TEX which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = TEX_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = TEX which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = TEX which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = TEX_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = TEX_SCO }

event = {
	id = 888251
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { u27 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u27_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u27_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u27_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u27_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = u27_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }

	offset = 1

event = {
	id = 888253
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U31 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U31_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U31_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U31_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}

				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}

				NOT = { local_flag = U31_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U31_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U31_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}

	name = "Winds of Change"

	style = 2

	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

event = {
	id = 888255
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U33 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U33_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U33_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {

				NOT = { local_flag = U33_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U33_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

		ai = yes

		command = { type = flag_ext where = u20 which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = u20 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = u20_LEN }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = u20 which = "_sdm" }
		command = { type = name where = u20 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = u20_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = u20_NAZ }

event = {
	id = 888257
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { SCO }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

	decision_trigger = {
		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_SCO }
				OR = { ideology = social_conservative }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_MLI }
				OR = { ideology = market_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_SLI }
				OR = { ideology = social_liberal }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_SDM }
				OR = { ideology = social_democrat }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_LWR }
				OR = { ideology = left_wing_radical }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_LEN }
				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = SCO_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
		}
	}

	name = "Winds of Change"
	desc = "The political reality in our country has changed and it is time to show the rest of the world proudly."
	style = 2

	date = { day = 26 month = june year = 1914 }
	offset = 1
	deathdate = { day = 30 month = december year = 1963 }

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = nazi }

		name = "Adopt a Nazi Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SCO which = "_naz" }
		command = { type = name where = SCO which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SCO_NAZ }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_SCO }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_LEN }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = SCO_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = fascist }

		name = "Adopt a Fascist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = SCO which = "_fas" }
		command = { type = name where = SCO which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = SCO_FAS }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U76_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U76_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U76_STA }
	}

	action = {
		trigger = { ideology = stalinist }

		name = "Adopt a Stalinist Flag"

		command = { type = flag_ext where = U76 which = "_sta" }
		command = { type = name where = U76 which = ""}
		command = { type = local_setflag which = U76_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U76_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U76_FAS }

event = {
	id = 888260
	random = no
	persistent = yes
	tag = { U73 }

	decision = {
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U73_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U73_FAS }
				OR = { ideology = fascist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U73_AUT }
				OR = { ideology = paternal_autocrat }

				OR = { ideology = leninist }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U73_STA }
				OR = { ideology = stalinist }
			}
			}
			}

		ai = no
	}

	trigger = {
		ai = yes
		OR = {

			AND = {
				NOT = { local_flag = U73_NAZ }
				OR = { ideology = nazi }

				OR = { ideology = stalinist }

	name = "Winds of Change"

	style = 2

	offset = 1

		command = { type = local_setflag which = U94_STA }

		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_NAZ }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_FAS }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_AUT }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_SOC }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_MLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_SLI }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_SDM }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_LWR }
		command = { type = local_clrflag which = U94_LEN }
	}
}
